tool_description: market data for used apple products
name: Apfelpreise
title: Apfelpreise

api_list.name: price
api_list.description: Get latest average price for manufacturer number

required_parameters.name: manufacturerNumBase64Encoded
required_parameters.description: A manufacturer number of an apple product, base64 encoded, e.g for a Apple MacBook Pro 13\\\" 2020 with manufacturer number MWP72D/A -> TVdQNzJEL0E=

required_parameters.name: condition
required_parameters.description:
ENUM, valid values are: USED, NEW, DEFECT, REFURBISHED

Note: Until now in v1, only values USED and REFURBISHED are allowed and give the same results (no distringuish between USED or REFURBISHED, so use any of the two.
In a future release, the other values will be also supported.
